channel.title: Good npc att and def command

item.title: Good npc att and def command
item.dc:creator: @webwebwebby webwebwebby
item.description:
@webwebwebby wrote:

Hey wats good, my goal is to first use :: pnpc to become the npc, and then use ::Anim to force my char to do the attack/defence/death animation. This is so i can see what i’m doing while i code, i find it helpful. Here’s what i have so far;

case "anim": int j = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); if (cmd.length < 2) { player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage("Use: ::anim id"); return true; } try { player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(j)); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage("Use: ::anim id"); } return true;
IDK if setNextAnimation is what i should be calling :\

EDIT: turns out my code works, stupid mistake on my part, anyone can use if they desire. -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Good npc att and def command
